SourceProxy.label: Gmsh Reader
SourceProxy.name: GmshReader

Documentation.long_help: Read mesh and their data stored in .msh files.

SourceProxy.Documentation: This Gmsh reader reads files stored in the .msh format. The expected file extension is .msh. The output of this reader is a multiblock data set. If physical groups are found, each group result in a block. Else 4 groups are created, 1 for each dimension.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the file name for the Gmsh reader.

IntVectorProperty.name: CreateGmshCellIDArray
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify if we create a cell data array containing Gmsh cell IDs.

IntVectorProperty.name: CreateGmshNodeIDArray
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify if we create a point data array containing Gmsh node IDs.

IntVectorProperty.name: CreateGmshEntityIDArray
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify if we create a cell data array containing Gmsh entity IDs.

IntVectorProperty.name: CreateGmshDimensionArray
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify if we create a field data array containing the dimension for a dataset.

IntVectorProperty.name: GroupByDimension
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify if physical groups should be grouped by dimension in a same node in the resulting composite dataset.

WriterProxy.name: GmshWriter
WriterProxy.Documentation: Write meshes with their data in a Gmsh file. Write temporal dataset into a single file containing all the timesteps.

IntVectorProperty.name: WriteGmshSpecificArray
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify if we write data arrays starting by "gmsh" (usually created by the Gmsh reader).

IntVectorProperty.name: WriteAllTimeSteps
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify if all timesteps have to be saved for temporal data.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: The name of the file to be written.

PSWriterProxy.name: PGmshWriter
PSWriterProxy.Documentation: Write meshes with their data in a Gmsh file. Write temporal dataset into a single file containing all the timesteps.

IntVectorProperty.name: WriteGmshSpecificArray
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify if we write data arrays starting by "gmsh" (usually created by the Gmsh reader).

IntVectorProperty.name: WriteAllTimeSteps
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify if all timesteps have to be saved for temporal data.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: The name of the file to be written.
